data.lyric:
[ti:Remind Me to Forget (Joe Mason Remix)]
[ar:Kygo/Miguel]
[al:Remind Me to Forget (Remixes)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Remind Me to Forget (Joe Mason Remix) - Kygo (凯戈)/Miguel
[00:00.19]Lyricist：Alex Oriet/David Phelan/Phil Plested
[00:00.38]Composer：Kyrre Gørvell-Dahll/Alex Oriet/David Phelan/Phil Plested/Miguel Jontel Pimentel
[00:00.58]It never fades away it's staying
[00:05.13]Your kiss like broken glass on my skin
[00:08.96]
[00:09.65]And all the greatest loves end in violence
[00:14.17]It's tearing up my voice left in silence
[00:18.15]
[00:18.94]Baby it hit so hard holding on to my chest
[00:22.81]
[00:23.42]Maybe you left your mark reminding me to forget
[00:27.38]
[00:27.93]It doesn't matter where you are you can keep my regret
[00:32.43]'Cause baby I got these scars reminding me to forget
[00:36.44]
[00:37.08]Reminding me I got these scars get your love
[00:41.08]
[00:42.19]Keep reminding me ooh to forget your love
[00:45.66]
[00:46.48]Reminding me I got these scars get your love
[00:50.79]
[00:51.37]Keep reminding me ooh to forget your love
[00:54.80]
[01:16.40]There's no room in war for feelings
[01:20.04]
[01:20.78]Hurt me to the core still healing
[01:24.43]
[01:25.15]And I know you're no good for me
[01:29.67]So I try to forget the memories
[01:33.63]
[01:34.23]Baby it hit so hard holding on to my chest
[01:38.88]Maybe you left your mark reminding me to forget
[01:42.71]
[01:43.34]It doesn't matter where you are you can keep my regret
[01:47.35]
[01:47.91]Baby I got these scars reminding me to forget
[01:51.96]
[02:12.69]Remember I told you
[02:14.98]To save it it's over
[02:16.66]
[02:17.61]And I'll be alright
[02:19.16]I'll be alright
[02:20.24]So hurt me as much as you like
[02:21.75]I need you to let go
[02:24.03]I got these mementos
[02:26.30]
[02:27.04]And I'll be alright
[02:28.60]
[02:31.45]Baby it hit so hard holding on to my chest
[02:35.41]
[02:35.94]Maybe you left your mark reminding me to forget
[02:40.45]It doesn't matter where you are you can keep my regret
[02:45.09]Baby I got these scars reminding me to forget
[02:49.06]
[03:28.12]Remember I told you
[03:30.18]To save it it's over
[03:32.08]
[03:33.33]And I'll be alright
[03:34.65]I'll be alright
[03:35.58]So hurt me as much as you like
[03:37.09]I need you to let go
[03:39.27]I got these mementos
[03:41.52]
[03:42.18]And I'll be alright
data.trans:
[ti:Remind Me to Forget (Joe Mason Remix)]
[ar:Kygo/Miguel]
[al:Remind Me to Forget (Remixes)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.19]//
[00:00.38]//
[00:00.58]它从未远离 它一直都在
[00:05.13]你的吻细细密密 就像我肌肤上的碎玻璃
[00:08.96]
[00:09.65]伟大的爱情都是以暴力结尾
[00:14.17]我的嗓音渐渐撕裂 最终只剩沉默
[00:18.15]
[00:18.94]宝贝 太过痛苦 拥抱我吧
[00:22.81]
[00:23.42]可能你留下了印记 提醒我将过去遗忘
[00:27.38]
[00:27.93]无论你身处何方 我对你一直怀有歉意
[00:32.43]宝贝 我这满身伤疤就是在提醒我遗忘
[00:36.44]
[00:37.08]提醒我 你的爱给了我这些伤疤
[00:41.08]
[00:42.19]它们时刻提醒我 忘记你的爱
[00:45.66]
[00:46.48]提醒我 你的爱给了我这些伤疤
[00:50.79]
[00:51.37]它们时刻提醒我 忘记你的爱
[00:54.80]
[01:16.40]硝烟四起 根本无法细心感受
[01:20.04]
[01:20.78]你让我元气大伤 我只能等待愈合
[01:24.43]
[01:25.15]我知道你对我已毫无情意
[01:29.67]所以我只能努力将过去忘掉
[01:33.63]
[01:34.23]宝贝 太过痛苦 拥抱我吧
[01:38.88]可能你留下了印记 提醒我将过去遗忘
[01:42.71]
[01:43.34]无论你身处何方 我对你一直怀有歉意
[01:47.35]
[01:47.91]宝贝 我这满身伤疤就是在提醒我遗忘
[01:51.96]
[02:12.69]记得我跟你讲过的吗
[02:14.98]为了保持更久 结果现在就结束了
[02:16.66]
[02:17.61]我会好的
[02:19.16]我会好的
[02:20.24]你可以尽情伤害我
[02:21.75]这样我才能放手
[02:24.03]我得到了纪念品
[02:26.30]
[02:27.04]我会好的
[02:28.60]
[02:31.45]宝贝 太过痛苦 拥抱我吧
[02:35.41]
[02:35.94]可能你留下了印记 提醒我将过去遗忘
[02:40.45]无论你身处何方 我对你一直怀有歉意
[02:45.09]宝贝 我这满身伤疤就是在提醒我遗忘
[02:49.06]
[03:28.12]记得我跟你讲过的吗
[03:30.18]为了保持更久 结果现在就结束了
[03:32.08]
[03:33.33]我会好的
[03:34.65]我会好的
[03:35.58]你可以尽情伤害我
[03:37.09]这样我才能放手
[03:39.27]我得到了纪念品
[03:41.52]
[03:42.18]我会好的
